document_data.caption: A songhorn from [[Aurora's Emporium]].
document_data.name: Songhorn
document_data.mainbody: A '''songhorn''' was a wind musical instrument, similar to a [[longhorn]].
document_data.Description:
Songhorns were simple recorders made of wood. Their sound was mellower than that of longhorns and fared better on lower ranges.

They were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.

Notable Users.Individuals: * [[Drake Bluenote]], a member of the [[bard]]ic group [[Adagio Jones and The Goodwinds]], played the songhorn for soft songs.<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/54/The New Rogues Gallery: Adagio Jones and The Goodwinds|8-9}}
